definition: lit. from head to tail (idiom); thoroughgoing/through and through/out and out/from top to bottom
head/hair style/the top/end/beginning or end/a stub/remnant/chief/boss/side/aspect/first/leading/classifier for pigs or livestock/CL:個|个[ge4]
horse's tail/pointed posterior section of a locust etc
tail/remainder/remnant/extremity/sixth of the 28 constellations/classifier for fish

sentences.english: Their statement was a downright inanity.
sentences.chinese: 他們的聲明是徹頭徹尾的廢話。

sentences.english: We are arrant knaves all; believe none of us.
sentences.chinese: 本人們都是徹頭徹尾的年夜騙子，別信本人們。

sentences.english: Don't trust him. He's every inch a liar.
sentences.chinese: 別信他，他是個徹頭徹尾的大騙子。

sentences.english: Self-given nick names are straight-up garbage and should never be used.
sentences.chinese: 自封綽號是徹頭徹尾的垃圾，誰都不該用。

sentences.english: They were thought as complete junks.
sentences.chinese: 它們被以爲是徹頭徹尾的渣滓。

sentences.english: Things are not gonna work out. He is an out and out daydreamer.
sentences.chinese: 不會成功的，他是個徹頭徹尾的空想家。

sentences.english: I'm an avid sailor, a dyed-in-the-wool blue-water man.
sentences.chinese: 我是個狂熱的水手，一個徹頭徹尾地深戀着大海的人。

sentences.english: Although the facts have proven that those who are out-and-out lie.
sentences.chinese: 雖然後來的事實證明，那些都是徹頭徹尾的謊言。

sentences.english: Jack is a real chauvinist pig.
sentences.chinese: 傑克是個徹頭徹尾的沙文主義者。

sentences.english: The boy is lazybones through and through.
sentences.chinese: 這個男孩是個徹頭徹尾的懶蟲。
這是一個徹頭徹尾的利己主義者。

sentences.english: It's an act of straight-out dishonesty.
sentences.chinese: 這是徹頭徹尾的欺詐行爲。
這是徹頭徹尾的強權政治。

sentences.english: The two weavers were cheats out and out.
sentences.chinese: 那兩個織工是徹頭徹尾的騙子。

sentences.english: They are dogs through and through.

sentences.chinese: 蜂蜜是徹頭徹尾誠實的廣告人。
